alert.note: Alert for Big Island South; Big Island Southeast; Lanai Mauka; Lanai South (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 12 at 3:06AM HST until December 12 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR PORTIONS OF MAUI COUNTY AND THE BIG ISLAND THROUGH 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... .A new strong area of high pressure building far north of the state will keep breezy to locally windy trades in place today. The strongest winds will occur over and downwind of terrain, and in saddle areas between mountains. Winds are expected to slowly east tonight and Tuesday. ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with localized gusts over 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Lanai and the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can knock down tree branches, blow away tents and unsecured objects, and make it difficult to drive, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.

area.areaDesc: Big Island South; Big Island Southeast; Lanai Mauka; Lanai South
